entries.title: Rangers Fans, Don't Cry Because It's Over
entries.description: Sports fans of all varieties needn’t be happy only when they win a championship.

entries.title: America's Disinformation Wrong Turn
entries.description: Academics figure out what Never Trumpers haven’t: The truth works better than lies.

entries.title: Biden Goes to Extremes to Appease Tehran
entries.description: He reportedly has gone so soft as to discourage allies in Europe from pressing their case at the IAEA.

entries.title: Glenn Loury's Story Shows How Not to Help
entries.description: The black conservative’s memoir is a cautionary tale of the unintended consequences of affirmative action.

entries.title: Biden's Border Election Gambit
entries.description: He finally takes some action with an executive order, but voters will wonder if he means it.

entries.title: Who's Really Prolonging the Gaza War?
entries.description: Biden blames Israel, but his own policies have dragged out the fighting.

entries.title: Lara Trump Denounces Larry Hogan
entries.description: The GOP co-chair follows her father-in-law and puts family loyalty above winning Senate seats.

entries.title: The Trump-Biden Presidential Debates
entries.description: Students discuss the candidates taking the stage on June 27.

entries.title: Biden's Cease-Fire Plan Seeks to Push Hamas and Israel Into a Deal Neither Wants
entries.description: The U.S. president is more interested in a deal than the two warring parties.

entries.title: Intel and Apollo in $11 Billion Joint Venture for Chip Manufacturing Plant in Ireland
entries.description: Apollo to hold an 49% equity interest stake in the joint venture.

entries.title: The WSJ Dollar Index Flat at 99.07
entries.description: The WSJ Dollar Index was flat at 99.07 — snapping a three-trading-day losing streak.

entries.title: FASB Proposes Rule on How Companies Account for Government Grants
entries.description: The Financial Accounting Standards Board wants to establish requirements on how companies account for government grants in their financial reports, a move to help investors compare businesses with each other as such aid becomes more prevalent.

entries.title: Did Hunter Biden Lie About Addiction When Buying a Gun? Prosecution and Defense Outline Arguments
entries.description: A federal prosecutor told a jury that President Biden’s son chose to illegally own a firearm while using drugs in 2018. The defense disputed that allegation.

entries.title: Garland Hearing Devolves Into Partisan Brawl
entries.description: The attorney general says “I will not be intimidated” as he faces a potential contempt vote in Congress.

entries.title: Broadcaster Diamond Sports Says Comcast Talks Have Broken Down
entries.description: The bankrupt regional sports business is fighting to emerge from chapter 11 amid a Comcast blackout in major markets.

entries.title: 'Why Lawd?' by NxWorries Review: A Soul Celebration
entries.description: Anderson .Paak and producer Knxwledge release their second studio album as a duo, drawing on vintage R&B to create a wide-ranging contemporary sound.

entries.title: Energy & Utilities Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Gain insight on sliding crude oil prices, BP, Galp Energia, Tenaga Nasional, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Energy and Utilities.

entries.title: Basic Materials Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Read about BHP, Northern Minerals and more in the latest Market Talks covering Basic Materials.

entries.title: Modi Loses Majority in Stunning Election Setback, But Is Set to Keep Power in India
entries.description: The Indian prime minister and his Hindu nationalist party failed to win an outright majority amid a revived opposition.

entries.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Read about Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Dutch Bros, Deliveroo and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.
